articles.title: Large Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy by Cambodian King
articles.content:
Large Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy by Cambodian King
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihamoni, King of Cambodia, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Written on the ribbon of the large floral basket were letters "We pay the highest tribute to HE Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the eternal president of the DPRK. Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia".  
					
					 The delegation of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on July 7 to lay the large floral basket before the portrait of the President upon the authorization of the king of Cambodia.

articles.title: Large Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy by Cambodian Great King
articles.content:
Large Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy by Cambodian Great King
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihanouk, Great King of Cambodia, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "We pay the highest tribute to HE Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the eternal president of the DPRK. Great King of Cambodia Norodom Sihanouk".
					
					 The delegation of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on July 7 to lay the large floral basket before the portrait of the President upon the authorization of the great king of Cambodia.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front issued a statement on July 8 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung, according to Kuguk Jonson (Internet).
					The statement described the history of more than 80 years of the President's life as the sacred and glorious life of a great man born of Heaven, who performed the immortal exploits in carving out the destiny of the nation and realizing the human cause of independence, glorifying his career as outstanding thinker, distinguished statesman, preeminent revolutionary and great person in the annals of the 20th century after personifying the prefect personality and qualification of a great man on the highest level.
					
					The President is the peerless patriot and eternal leader and benevolent teacher of humankind as he is enjoying boundless reverence and ardent praises from all people for the exploits he performed for the country and the nation, times and history, it said.
					
					The statement noted that the cause of Juche pioneered by the President has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and steady continuity has been given to the revolutionary history of the President century after century.
					
					Today the situation on the Korean Peninsula is at the worst crisis and manifold trials and hardships are standing in the way of national reunification due to the United States' moves to stifle the DPRK, it noted, adding: However, the reunification of the peninsula is sure to be achieved under the banner of "By our nation itself" as there is Kim Jong Il. This is the unanimous faith and will of the south Korean people.
					
					A reunified, great prosperous and powerful nation will be built without fail as there is the brilliant great programme of national reunification clarified by the President and Kim Jong Il is leading the cause of national reunification to victory with his invincible Songun politics, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by British Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by British Figure
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung performed distinguished exploits which no great man in the world could ever do, said Shawn Pikford, delegate of the British organization for the study of the Juche idea, when interviewed by a KCNA reporter before his departure from Pyongyang on July 8. 
					Noting that the Juche idea founded by the President has encouraged the progressive people in their struggle for independence, social justice and world peace, he said:
					
					The validity and vitality of the Juche idea have been proved in practice and the idea has been studied and disseminated among people of broad strata of the world. 
					
					The great Juche idea serves as a powerful weapon in the struggle for independent life as it is favored and followed by world progressives. 
					
					The 21st century will shine more brightly when it advances as guided by the Juche idea.
					
					Recalling that he had the chance to see many people visiting the statue of the President on Mansu Hill to pay highest tribute to him on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise, he emphasized that the army and people of the DPRK are highly praising the President as a great father of the nation and eternal sun. 
					
					He went on:
					
					The President is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives for his immortal exploits performed for the human cause of independence. 
					
					The revolutionary cause of the President is being successfully carried out by General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to President Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Functions were separately held at the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America and at Kim Il Sung Economic Special School in Cuba on July 7 to lay floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present at the events were Alfonso Fraga Perez, secretary-general of the organization, and its members, personages of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and Kim Il Sung Economic Special School and masses and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants placed floral baskets before the portraits of the smiling President and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Film Show Held by Chongryon
articles.content:
Film Show Held by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a film show in Tokyo on Wednesday on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President        Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and its vice-chairmen, deputies to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, advisors of Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the head of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, directors of the above-said committee, leading officials of central organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, and chairmen and officials, advisors and workers in commerce of the Chongryon Headquarters in Kanto area and compatriots and Korean youth and students. 
					
					 Korean documentary film "Among the People All His Life" was shown there.

articles.title: 15th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Cuba and China
articles.content:
15th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Cuba and China
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Cuba and China on July 6 and 7 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present at the remembrance meeting held in Cuba were personages of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and
						Kim Il Sung Economic Special School and masses and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					Jose Manuel Garcia Torres, vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said in a speech made at the meeting that Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the revolution and the people all his life.
					
					The Cuban people always remember the facts that Kim Il Sung, their close friend, extended disinterested support to Cuba each time the Cuban revolution underwent the most stern trials and he accorded Fidel Castro Ruz cordial hospitality during the latter's visit to the DPRK, he stressed.
					
					Present at the remembrance meeting held in China were figures of the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact, families of the persons related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and officials of the Beijing Nanjiao Farm and the China-Korea Friendship Hongxing Farm.
					
					Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy and the delegation of the DPRK-China Friendship Association.
					
					Li Xiaohua, vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, and Feng Yila, family member of a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and other speakers said at the meeting that Kim Il Sung devoted all his energies to the liberation of Korea, socialist construction and independent reunification all his life, adding that he was a close friend and comrade-in-arms of the Chinese people.
					
					They stated that Kim Il Sung is boundlessly revered by the Chinese people for forging and fostering the great Sino-DPRK friendship together with Chairman Mao Zedong and making an immortal contribution to the development of the good neighborly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Brazil, Mexico and Guinea between June 22 and 27 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					Pedro de Oliveira, chairman of the Brasilia Federal District Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, in a lecture referred to the immortal exploits and noble traits of the President.
					
					The Brazilian Communist Party will as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the efforts to defend sovereignty of the country, build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve national reunification and always stand by the side of the Korean people in the struggle against imperialism and the United States, he declared.
					
					Benjamin Laureano Luna, chairperson of the Front for Human Rights of Mexico, noted that
						Kim Il Sung had firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation from the imperialists' aggression, holding high the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea during the whole period of his revolutionary activities. And he stressed that the immortal exploits performed by the President in realizing the popular masses' cause of independence would shine forever.
					
					The Korean people have reliably defended Korean-style socialism under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il while frustrating the moves of the U.S. and other imperialist forces to stifle the DPRK, he said.
					
					Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, said that the great attraction of the immortal Juche idea founded by the President is growing stronger as the days go by.

articles.title: National Meeting Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
National Meeting Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to commemorate the 115th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Ri Yong Mu and others and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people in Pyongyang, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, in his report made at the meeting said that the whole life of Kim Hyong Jik was  a great life of a genuine nationalist and patriot who dedicated his all to the independence of the country and the liberation of the nation and a brilliant life of a prominent revolutionary who performed undying feats to be recorded in the history of the nation spanning 5,000 years and the history of the national liberation movement in Korea.
					
					He said that Kim Hyong Jik was a great pioneer who set forth the noble idea of "Jiwon" (aim high), instilling the faith in the independence of the country and the spirit of national independence and the indomitable fighting spirit into the Korean people and indicating a new way to be followed by the anti-Japanese national liberation movement.
					
					Saying that the idea of "Jiwon", a revolutionary theory, served not only as the only guiding idea for the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea in those days but an ideological and moral pabulum putting spurs to the start of the revolutionary cause of Juche and its victorious advance as it reflected the undisputed trust in the strength of the people, the steadfast independent stand on achieving independence by their own efforts and the indomitable spirit of overcoming any trial and difficulty, the reporter stressed that therein lay the great historic exploits performed by Kim Hyong Jik.
					
					The reporter recalled that Kim Hyong Jik formed the Korean National Association on March 23, 1917, thus providing the Korean people with a revolutionary organization capable of rallying all the anti-Japanese patriotic forces around it to give uniform guidance to the national liberation movement on a nation-wide scale and as a result the anti-Japanese national liberation movement could confidently advance thanks to the independent force of the nation.
					
					Kim Hyong Jik was a great pioneer who made a switchover from the nationalist movement to the proletarian revolution, holding aloft the banner of proletarian revolution, and a revolutionary educator, an indomitable fighter and a true man who recorded the whole course of his revolutionary struggle with the warm love for the younger generation, staunch revolutionary spirit and noble virtues, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					President Kim Il Sung stood at the head of the revolution as an outstanding leader required by the times and craved for by the nation by going through the extraordinary course of growth as a revolutionary from his boyhood and this made it possible for the Korean people to enjoy the greatest fortune of holding the President in high esteem for the first time in the history spanning 5,000 years. This is the most distinguished feat performed by Kim Hyong Jik for the country and its people.
					
					Noting that Kim Hyong Jik enabled the Korean people to be blessed with the illustrious leaders, the fortune which people of no other country could ever enjoy, the reporter emphasized that he bequeathed the idea of "Jiwon", three contingencies, the idea of recruiting comrades and two pistols to Kim Il Sung as a legacy and this precious revolutionary legacy serves as a noble revolutionary asset putting spurs to the start of the revolutionary cause of Juche and its victorious advance.
					
					Kim Hyong Jik's noble idea of "Jiwon" has been steadfastly carried forward in the new era of the Juche-oriented revolution and the era of Songun with the old generation and century replaced by the new generation and century, the reporter said, calling on all the Korean people to bring as early as possible the day when they will be able to enjoy happiness in a reunified and thriving country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Brazilian Ambassador
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Arnaldo  Carrilho, Brazilian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Extravaganza "Arirang" To Be Staged
articles.content:
Extravaganza "Arirang" To Be Staged
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", winner of
					Kim Il Sung Prize, will be staged at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang from August 10 to late September.
					"Arirang" produced on the occasions of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army has demonstrated before the world the invincible might of Songun Korea in which the army and people are rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the tremendous mental power of the Korean people and the development of the Juche-oriented culture and art, evoking lively response at home and abroad.
					
					 The group of creators and performers are successfully pushing forward its re-representation at a final phase.

articles.title: Successes in Pilot Sectors of National Economy
articles.content:
Successes in Pilot Sectors of National Economy
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Four pilot sectors of the national economy keep vigorously advancing in the van of the 150-day campaign in the DPRK.
					 The Posan Iron Works of the Chollima Steel Complex overfulfilled the every monthly production quota of Juche iron and turned out the Juche iron nearly three times in June in comparison with the corresponding period of the year before.
					
					 The Chongjin Steel Works completed the construction of a new shaft furnace which is of great significance in the production of the Juche iron.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex restructured the production processes to increase the steel output by 50 percent.
					
					 Thermal power plants in different parts of the country increased the electricity production in the first half of the year by hundreds of millions of kilowatts as against the same period of the previous year.
					
					 After the construction of the Nyongwon Power Station, many achievements have been made in the dam, aqueduct tunnel, waterway, and other projects at the construction sites of the hydro-power stations in various parts of the country including the Huichon, Kumyagang and Paektusan Songun Youth power stations.
					
					 Coal production plans for June have been carried out ahead of schedule at coal mines in Tokchon, Sunchon, Anju, Tukjang, Pukchang and Kaechon of South Phyongan Province, Kujang of North Phyongan Province and Kangdong area of Pyongyang.
					
					 All other collieries across the country also hit their production targets.
					
					 The workers in the railway transport sector transported hundreds of thousands of tons of freight in June more than the same period of the last year.

articles.title: Militant Slogan Arousing All Army and People
articles.content:
Militant Slogan Arousing All Army and People
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The militant slogan "Everything for victory in the great upsurge!" is seen in every socialist construction site of Korea where a 150-day campaign is going on to make a breakthrough in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					The Workers' Party of Korea has put forth powerful fighting slogans in each important turning phase of revolution and construction to arouse the whole Party and entire people to efforts for a fresh victory.
					
					The above-said slogan calls upon the people to hasten the current general advance with the do-or-die spirit which was displayed in the 1950s and bring about great innovation and great leap-forward in every sector of the economy by mobilizing all the potentialities of the country and thus to occupy the last fortress for the building of a thriving nation without fail.
					
					In the 1950s, President Kim Il Sung advanced the slogan "Everything for victory in the war!" to cope with the grave situation of the country created by the armed invasion of the U.S. imperialists to arouse all the servicepersons and people vigorously.
					
					This slogan enabled the Korean army and people to perform world-startling military miracles in the three-year long war by beating down the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 In the postwar years, too, the Korean people turned out as one in response to the slogan "Everything for the postwar rehabilitation and development of the national economy to strengthen our democratic base!" set forth by the President. They healed the severe war wounds and carried out with credit the huge tasks of rehabilitation and construction in less than three years after the war, though the U.S. imperialists raved that Korea would fail to recover itself within 100 years.
					
					The United States and its followers are making desperate efforts to prevent the DPRK which is strong politically and militarily from developing economically onto higher stage.
					
					But no one can hold in check the advance of the DPRK which is winning victory after victory thanks to the tested and wise leadership of the revolutionary headquarters, the national power strengthened incomparably through the Songun revolution, single-minded unity of the whole army and people and the invincible revolutionary army.
					
					As the successful launch of the artificial satellite "Kwangmyongsong-2" and the second nuclear test showed, the national strength of the DPRK is on a very high level and all the sectors of the national economy are pushing ahead with technical updating with its own effort, technology and method.
					
					The Korean people will certainly build an economic power along the way chosen by them, frustrating the moves of the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Stamp out Jongyojo Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Stamp out Jongyojo Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy of south Korea held a press conference on July 3 at which it denounced the Lee Myung Bak group for its frantic suppression of the Teachers Union in south Korea (Jongyojo).
					 The organization charged that the authorities' search operation against Jongyojo is a brutal action unprecedented even in the period of dictatorship in the past. 
					
					The Lee group is working hard to calm down the public resentment at the unpopular educational policy by cracking down upon Jongyojo and leaving no means untried to put teachers under its control, the organization noted, adding that this is a clear indication that there is no longer freedom of expression on this land. 
					
					It has become clearer that the Lee conservative ruling forces are a group of dictators, the organization held, declaring that it would struggle against their repressive moves to gag the teachers.
					
					If the Lee group does not stop the suppression of the freedom of expression and Jongyojo, the second movement for issuing declarations on the situation will develop into an all-people movement, it warned.

articles.title: Young People Called upon to Take Lead in Actions for Forcing Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down
articles.content:
Young People Called upon to Take Lead in Actions for Forcing Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down 
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for the students committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea issued an appeal on July 4 calling on the youth and students to take the lead in the actions for forcing the Lee Myung Bak group to step down.
					 The appeal noted that the struggle to force the Lee regime of traitors to step down has been placed on a higher stage.
					
					 Lee and the conservative ruling forces have enforced all sorts of misrule and harshly violated democracy in disregard of the people, thus inviting self-destruction, the appeal noted.
					
					 It accused the Lee group of having been engrossed in fascist suppression of pro-reunification movement organizations and personages after totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and committed crimes against the nation and reunification as evidenced by its full participation in the dangerous PSI, etc.
					
					 The movement for issuing declarations on the situation being waged by people from all walks of life these days indicates that the anti-Lee Myung Bak front has grown stronger, the appeal said, urging the need to bring down the traitorous "government" under the uplifted banner of anti-Lee Myung Bak and anti-dictatorship.

articles.title: Withdrawal of Unpopular and Undemocratic Policy Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Unpopular and Undemocratic Policy Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Political parties and civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Democratic Labor Party and the People's Council for People's Livelihood and Democracy held a rally in Taejon on July 5 at which they demanded the puppet authorities roll back their policy against the people's livelihood and democracy.
					 The participants in the rally accused Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" of desperately trying to retrogressively revise the "law on part-time job" as intended by them while working hard to prevent the part-timers from becoming full-timers.
					
					 Charging that the authorities are keen to cut down the taxes to be paid by the rich and helping big businesses gain huge profits under the pretext of "improving four large rivers", they termed the Lee Myung Bak regime a regime keen on plundering common people.
					
					 They demanded Lee make an apology to the bereaved families of the slain evacuees in Ryongsan, make a switchover in his self-righteous "state administration" and retract at once all the evil bills and policies meeting the interests of the business tycoons.
					
					 They called on all the people to pool efforts and force Lee to step down and deal a decisive blow at the GNP.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration march.

articles.title: Norodom Sihanouk envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Norodom Sihanouk envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 15o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente
					 Kim Il Sung, el gran rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihanouk, envio un gran cesto de flores a la Embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su pais.
					En la cinta del cesto se leia: "Rindo el maximo homenaje a Su Excelencia Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Del Gran rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihanouk".
					
					Por encargo del remitente, la delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya presidida por el vicepremier encargado de este palacio, Kong Sam Ol, visito el dia 7 la embajada coreana y lo coloco al pie del retrato del Presidente.

articles.title: Rey camboyano envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Rey camboyano envia gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 15o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente        Kim Il Sung, el rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihamoni, mando un gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana en su pais.
					En la cinta del cesto se leia: "Rindo el maximo tributo a Su Excelencia el Generalisimo             Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Del rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihamoni".
					
					Por encargo del remitente, la delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya encabezada por el vicepremier encargado de este palacio, Kong Sam Ol, visito el dia 7 la embajada coreana y lo coloco al pie del retrato del Presidente.

articles.title: Se iniciara el nuevo ciclo de funcion "Arirang"
articles.content:
Se iniciara el nuevo ciclo de funcion "Arirang"
 Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- Tendra lugar del 10 de agosto a finales de septiembre en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", obra laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					Esta obra creada con motivo del 90o aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea viene manifestando a todo el mundo el poderio invencible de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar), en que todos los militares y habitantes estan unidos firmemente en torno al Dirigente     Kim Jong Il, la inagotable potencia espiritual del pueblo coreano y el aspecto del desarrollo de la literatura y el arte del Juche.
					
					Ademas, produce hoy tambien grandes repercusiones en el interior y el exterior del pais.
					
					Ahora el colectivo de creadores y los ejecutantes estan readaptando magnificamente en la etapa final ese espectaculo fascinante.

articles.title: Exitos logrados en ramas prioritarias de la economia nacional
articles.content:
Exitos logrados en ramas prioritarias de la economia nacional
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- Los trabajadores de las industrias electrica, carbonifera y metalurgica y del transporte ferroviario, conocidos como 4 ramas prioritarias de la economia nacional, siguen marchando al frente de la campana de 150 dias.
					En la Fundicion de Hierro de Posan del Complejo de Acero Chollima cumplio con exceso en los ultimos meses el plan de produccion del hierro del Juche y en junio, lo produjo casi 3 veces que la cantidad producida en igual periodo del ano pasado.
					
					 La Aceria de Chongjin termino la construccion del nuevo horno vertical que tiene mucha importancia para la produccion del hierro del Juche.
					
					 El Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae logro aumentar 1.5 veces la produccion de acero mediante la modernizacion de procesos productivos.
					
					 Entre tanto, las centrales termoelectricas en diferentes localidades del pais generaron en el primer semestre cientos de millones de KWh mas que en el mismo periodo del ano pasado.
					
					 Por otra parte, termino la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Nyongwon y se da buen impulso a la edificacion del dique y el canal, etc. en los campos de construccion de plantas hidroelectricas a lo largo del pais, inclusive la de Huichon, la de Kumyagang y la de la Juventud Songun de Paektusan.
					
					 Igualmente, todas las minas de carbon en el pais cumplieron sus planes de produccion.
					
					 Especialmente, las minas de carbon de Tokchon, Sunchon, Anju, Tukjang, Pukchang, Kaechon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y de Kujang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y en la zona de Kangdong de la ciudad de Pyongyang cumplieron con adelanto sus planes de produccion para el mes de junio.
					
					 En la rama de transporte ferroviario se creo la innovacion de transportar cientos de miles de toneladas mas que en igual periodo del ano pasado.
